select MS_VESSEL_KIND_ID, VESSEL_KIND_NAME, DELETE_FLAG, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS
from MS_VESSEL_KIND where DELETE_FLAG = 0 order by MS_VESSEL_KIND_ID

select MS_VESSEL_KIND_ID, VESSEL_KIND_NAME, DELETE_FLAG, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS
from MS_VESSEL_KIND where MS_VESSEL_KIND_ID = :MS_VESSEL_KIND_ID

INSERT INTO MS_VESSEL_KIND( MS_VESSEL_KIND_ID, VESSEL_KIND_NAME, DELETE_FLAG, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES( :MS_VESSEL_KIND_ID, :VESSEL_KIND_NAME, :DELETE_FLAG, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE MS_VESSEL_KIND SET VESSEL_KIND_NAME = :VESSEL_KIND_NAME, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID, TS = :TS
where MS_VESSEL_KIND_ID = :MS_VESSEL_KIND_ID and TS = :TS
